column122: I won't go too much into detail about the actual story or gameplay. I'm a new FFXIV player. This game did something I'd not imagined possible. I never played XI
column124: but this one brings out the best of old school Final Fantasy feel
column125: while bringing a lot of new to the table. Think of it as a group chat almost except with many added benefits that I won't go into for the sake of time and length of this review.Also
column126: the Class/Job system that many MMORPG players are familiar with
column127: is well integrated in FFXIV. People are trying to work together to rebuild Eorzea back to its former glory. You are supposedly an adventurer who was there at the Calamity 5 years ago but you don't remember any of it. It's as simple as switching your main hand weapon. If you've unlocked a certain class

column646: but has a year of Playstation Plus. I bought a 500gb 7200rpm hard drive on sale for $55 (A guy on Youtube showed how he used an SSD). The entire upgrade with OS install and everything took about 30 minutes. Since most people aren't paying customers of PSN the network likely doesn't have a server backbone that's equal to that of Xbox Live
column647: hence why all the downloads took so long.Additionally
column648: Xbox users are used to downloading a game and jumping right into it. It's a fun game
column649: but I wish there was a different game they would have bundled with it. The reason is because this bundle comes with PS Plus
column650: and one of the games you get for free with PS Plus is Uncharted 3. Bundle comes with Uncharted 3 GOTY edition & 1-year's worth of PS+ (which guarantees you tons of free games & other discounts ongoing). You can dowload all this free content on the 250gb Hard Drive."

column793: {"context": "Taxiing the plane using rudder and brakes together works smooth and is easy to control. I velcroed the pedals to a large plywood sheet and attached the sheet to the desk legs with small angle brackets and machine screws. All 3 of these combine with CH's software to make one huge virtual device. So if you then go to Windows control panel's game control applet you see 1 device not 3. That one device has six axis and 32 buttons! Don't worry about the apparent duplication. Both are sliders and both will work.In a nutshell

column1199: {"context": "Yes I am one of those oddballs who can not live with a Keyboard that does not click right under their fingers. This one feels nice and sounds nice. The fact that the keys light up nicely make it easier to use. First off
column1200: I'd like to say I am even more impressed with this keyboard than when I read about it's features. It is worth every penny.This keyboard as a ton of cool features
column1201: but most of them are only really useful for PC gamers. You can easily pull up a the window to change or assign macros. I don't use the macros but if/when I go back to a MMORPG (massive multiplayer online role playing game) I might use them.Logitech continues to make great products. I just bought this gaming keyboard today at BB (can't say exactly or Amazon will make me disapear lol) for $19. I was waiting for the price to go down and behold it did by a huge margin much to my surprise. I was amazed to see this great keyboard for less than $20 and it wasn't even an open boxed item (simply because of the new G15 keyboard became available). I've read the other views (both negative and positive) and the opinions vary."
